description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony, and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope; two storey side extension; single storey rear extension; single storey front porch extension; alteration to external elevations, involving installation of window to side elevation.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings titled: 	Revised Proposed First Floor Plan dated 10/11/2021 drawing no.003A Rev 1, Revised Proposed Street Elevation Plan dated 10/11/2021 drawing no.004 Rev 1, Revised Proposed Right Hand Side Elevation Plan dated 10/11/2021 drawing no.005, Revised Proposed Rear Elevation Plan dated 10/11/2021 drawing no.006 Rev 1, Revised Proposed Roof Plan dated 10/11/2021 drawing no.007 and Revised Proposed 3D Views dated 10/11/2021 drawing no.008.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - section12 | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D3 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019) - section 12.
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan 2013, policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section 12 - Achieving well-designed places.
